1273170.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night TP122: Wasteland Warriors 1
1273170.description:
Devin Night TP122: Wasteland Warriors 1

TP122 Warriors of the Wasteland 1, This pack contains 39 hand-drawn and colored tokens of survivors or space-faring characters and their pets. This pack contains only female characters.
This product contains:
  • Dog Armored Large
  • 2 Dog Armored Sheperd
  • 5 Dog Shepherd
  • 3 Female BC
  • 3 Female BC Armor Helm
  • Female BC Armor Sit Helm
  • 3 Female BC Armored
  • Female BC Armored Sit
  • 3 Female BC Red
  • 2 Female BC Sit
  • 3 Female BC Vest
  • Female BC Armored MG Helm
  • Female BC Armored MG
  • 2 Female Human Melody
  • 2 Female Human Shooter
  • 6 Female Human Tanith
Converted by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
